front.title: The Java LDAP Application Program Interface

abstract.t: This document defines a java language application program interface tothe lightweight directory access protocol (LDAP), in the form of a classlibrary. It complements but does not replace RFC 1823 ([9]), whichdescribes a C language application program interface. It updates andreplaces draft-ietf-asid-ldap-java-api-00.txt [13], in adding clarifica-tion on behavior under various circumstances, and in revising supportfor language-sensitive attribute parsing. Other additions and correc-tions are listed in the appendix.
